name: Shape Shift Shawn: Episode 1 (Demo)
description:
You are Shawn, average 10-year-old boy.  While out trick-or-treating one fateful Halloween night, Shawn takes a tumble into a deep, deep hole, and discovers a twisted underground world populated with terrifying monsters out to have Shawn for lunch. But with the help of the friendly Muties, Shawn discovers that he now has the ability to shape-shift into powerful new forms. And he'll need all the help he can get on this harrowing journey back home...

  • Shape-shift into four crazy monsters! Each of Shawn's transformations has a unique gameplay mechanic to master!
  • A bizarre, sidescrolling odyssey, presented in three episodes! And you can download the first episode for free!
  • Over 50 levels across three episodes! Shawn will need to run, jump, swim, and climb through a gauntlet worthy of any sidescrolling veteran!
  • 3D pre-rendered graphics! Explore a beautiful 3D pre-rendered world, with a hint of retro sidescroller presentation!
  • A truly funky soundtrack! Jam out to a stellar soundtrack featuring veteran funk drummer G. Calvin Weston, Max Ridgway, Paul Rogalski, and more!
